data.name: MessageCheckBox_RemoveFileFromDiskToo
data.value: Remove file from disk too. Be carefull !!

data.name: Message_AreYouSureToRemoveAllImages
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all images associated to the entry from the database ? This can't be undone.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureToRemoveAllInfoFiles
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all info files associated to the entry from the database ? This can't be undone.

data.name: Message_AreYousureToRemoveAllManuals
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all manuals associated to the entry from the database ? This can't be undone.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureToRemoveImage
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this image from database ? This can't be undone.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureToRemoveInfoFile
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this info file from database ? This can't be undone.

data.name: Message_AreYouSuretoRemoveManual
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this manual from database ? This can't be undone.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteSelectedFodlers
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected fodlers ?

data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToStopCurrentProgress
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop current progress ?

data.name: Message_CodeAlreadyExistInTheList
data.value: Code is already exist in the list

data.name: Message_DoYouWantToCreateThisFolder
data.value: Do you want to create this folder ?

data.name: Message_NoCodeInTheListToSave
data.value: No code in the list to save !

data.name: Message_NoExtensionAddedYet
data.value: No extension added yet, please fill the extensions field or click the Reset button to reset extensions.

data.name: Message_NoFolderToSearch
data.value: No folder to search, please add at least one folder.

data.name: Message_PleaseEnterTheSearchWordFirst
data.value: Please enter the search word first.

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectTheInputDeviceFirst
data.value: Please select the input device first.

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectTheSearchByColumnFirst
data.value: Please select the search by column first.

data.name: Message_ThereIsNoCodeInTheList
data.value: There is no code in the list.

data.name: Message_TheSnapshotsFolderIsntExistAt
data.value: The Snapshots folder isn't exist at

data.name: Message_TheSRAMFolderIsntExistAt
data.value: The SRAM folder isn't exist at

data.name: Message_TheSTATEFolderIsntExistAt
data.value: The STATE folder isn't exist at

data.name: Message_ThisFileIsNotMyNesGameGenieCodesListFile
data.value: This file is not My Nes Game Genie codes list file

data.name: Message_YouMustRestartTheProgramToApplyLanguage
data.value: You must restart My Nes to apply selected language interface

data.name: Message_YouMustSekectOneFolderToSearch
data.value: You must add at least one folder to search !\nPlease click on the Add button to add a folder to scan.

data.name: Text_AddFolderToTheScanList
data.value: Add folder to the scan list

data.name: Message_AnotherOperationInProgress
data.value: Another Database operation in progress. Please try again later.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToCreateNewDB
data.value: Are you sure you want to create a new database ? This will erase all entries and info such as snapshots.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteSelectedEntries
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected entries from the database ? This can't be undone.

data.name: Message_GameFileNotExistOrNoFileAssignedToThisGameYet
data.value: Game file not exist or no file assigned to this game yet.

data.name: Message_GameGenieCantBeUSedWhileEmuOf
data.value: Game Genie can be configured only during game run time. Please open the game you want to config the Game Genie for.

data.name: Message_NoDbLoadedYet
data.value: No database loaded yet ! Please click on NEW button to create a database.

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectOneGameToOpenLocation
data.value: Please select one game to open location.

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectOneGameToPlay
data.value: Please select one game to play.

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectOneGameToShowInfoOf
data.value: Please select one game to show info of.

data.name: Message_ThisFileIsNoLongerExistDoYouWantToDeleteItFromTheRecentList
data.value: This file is no longer exist. Do you want to delete it from the recent list ?

data.name: Message_YouNeedToHardResetCurrentGameToApplyRegionSettings
data.value: You need to hard reset current game to apply region settings

data.name: About_CopyrightNotice
data.value:
MY NES ------------ A Nintendo Entertainment System / Family Computer (Nes/Famicom) Emulator written in C#.
Copyright © Ala Ibrahim Hadid 2009 - 2014 Email: ahdsoftwares@hotmail.com
This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.
You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Important!! ------------ NES is either a trademark or registered trademark of Nintendo of America Inc. Famicom is either a trademark or registered trademark of Nintendo Co., LTD. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners. My Nes is not affiliated with or endorsed by any of the companies mentioned.
Icons: ------- Mark James http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/silk/
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 License. [ http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ ]
MLV: ------ Managed ListView control. Copyright © 2013 Ala Ibrahim Hadid. This is an article about this project includes all the information. http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/538518/Managed-ListView
MMB: ------- Managed Message Box Copyright © 2013 Ala Hadid. https://sourceforge.net/projects/managedmessagebox/
7-Zip ------ 7-Zip Copyright (C) 1999-2010 Igor Pavlov.
Licenses for files are:
1) 7z.dll: GNU LGPL + unRAR restriction 2) All other files: GNU LGPL
The GNU LGPL + unRAR restriction means that you must follow both GNU LGPL rules and unRAR restriction rules.
Note: You can use 7-Zip on any computer, including a computer in a commercial organization. You don't need to register or pay for 7-Zip.
ZLIP ----- Copyright (c) 2006-2007, ComponentAce http://www.componentace.com All rights reserved.
Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer. Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution. Neither the name of ComponentAce nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this software without specific prior written permission. THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
SlimDX -------- Copyright (c) 2007-2010 SlimDX Group
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
SlimDX Media --------------- All of the SlimDX media is covered by the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/us/
You are free: * To Share - to copy, distribute, display, and perform the work * To Remix - to make derivative works
Under the following conditions: * Attribution - You must attribute the work in the manner specified by the author or licensor (but not in any way that suggests that they endorse you or your use of the work). * Share Alike - If you alter, transform, or build upon this work, you may distribute the resulting work only under the same, similar or a compatible license.
For any reuse or distribution, you must make clear to others the license terms of this work. The best way to do this is with a link to the above web page.
Any of the above conditions can be waived if you get permission from the copyright holder.
Apart from the remix rights granted under this license, nothing in this license impairs or restricts the author's moral rights.

data.value:

data.name: Message_PaletteFileCantBeFound
data.value: The palette file can't be found. The palette settings switched to generators. Go to Settings>Palette to configure the palettes.

data.name: Message_PaletteFileNotValid
data.value: The palette file is not valid. Switch back to generators. To config palette settings, go to Settings>Palette.

data.name: Message_PaletteFileNotExistOrSelected
data.value: Palette file not exist; please add palette file via clicking on the Add link or select Use Generator settings instead.

data.name: Message_ReplacePaletteFile
data.value: A palette file with the same name already exist, replace it ?

data.name: Message_ThisGameHaveKnownIssues
data.value: This game belongs to a board/mapper that have known issues with My Nes

data.name: Message_ThisGameMapperMarkedAsNotSupported
data.value: This game mapper marked as not supported. My Nes still can run this game using default Nes configuration (mapper 0). Do you want My Nes to run this game ?

data.name: Text_AlwaysTryToRunGameWithNoSupportedMappers
data.value: &Always try to run game with no supported mappers, never show this message again.

data.name: Status_DefaultEntriesFromNesCartDBGeneratedSuccessfully
data.value: Default entries from NesCartDB generated successfully.

data.name: Status_UpdatingDatabase
data.value: Updating database (this may take a few minutes)
